attributes.action: Stop the proposed new development of the Quays Shopping Centre on the canal in Banbury
attributes.additional_details: The proposed development will destroy much of the peace and tranquility of the Oxford Canal.  The introduction of bars and restaurants plus a cinema complex will be overwhelming.  There are also plans to build a glass roof over the canal.  All of this plus the demolition of The General Foods Club is unacceptable.  The whole development needs a serious review.
